DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate an analgesic effect without basal administration of local anesthetics for patient-controlled femoral nerve block (with sciatic nerve block) after total knee arthroplasty.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Optimal Dose of Local Anesthetics for Patient Controlled Continuous Femoral Nerve Block
DOC.criteria: patients older than 20 yrs old scheduled for total knee arthroplasty
